name: Nomcebo Zikode
description:
'''Nomcebo Nothule Zikode''' (born 28 October 1985) is a [[South African people|South African]] singer and songwriter.

Born in [[Hammarsdale]], Zikode was a backing singer for several years. She collaborated with DJ Ganyani on their hit single "Emazulwini" (2018). Having signed a record deal with Open Mic Production, she co-wrote and was featured on [[Master KG]]'s chart-topping single "[[Jerusalema]]" (2019), which debuted number 1 on [[Billboard Hot 100|Billboard]] charts and [[Apple Music]] charts.

Her debut album ''Xola Moya Wam'' was released in 2020, containing two successful singles, "Xola Moya Wam" and "Bayabuza".
